mapper.insert: insert into cat (id, name, cat_color_id, content, age, shelter_id,img, created_person) values (#{id}, #{name} , #{catColorId}, #{content}, #{age},#{shelterId},#{img},#{createdPerson})
mapper.select: select rownum, id, name, cat_color_id, content, age, shelter_id, img, created_date, created_person, modified_date, modified_person, status from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id desc) as rownum, c.* from cat c) c2 where c2.rownum between ${start} and ${end}
